#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(NdAutoSignFinal)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")
add_executable(NdAutoSignFinal NdAutoSignFinal.cpp NdCalculateUtil.cpp NdHttpClient.cpp NdTask.cpp)
target_link_libraries(NdAutoSignFinal -lcrypto -lcurl -ljsoncpp -lpthread "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG} -Wall -std=c++11 -g3 -fno-inline -DUSE_THREADPOOL")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE} -Wall -O2 -ggdb")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELWITHDEBINFO} -Wall -std=c++11 -O2")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++11")
set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG} -DUSE_THREADPOOL")
